Sandstrand, 3 km lang, flach abfallend, für Kinder geeignet, 1 km vom Ort. Sporthafen. Minigolf 2 km. Angeln (mit Bewilligung). Wanderwege. Fahrradwege, Vermietung von Fahrrädern. Entlang der Küste Nordwestjütlands, von Skagen im Norden bis Agger im Süden, können Sie Nordeuropas weißeste und breiteste Sandstrände erleben. Hier liegen die gemütlichen Badeorte, die Ihnen alles bieten, was Ihr Herz begehrt. An einigen Stellen können Sie immer noch die Fischer beobachten, die wie in alten Tagen ihre Fischerboote auf den Strand ziehen. Auf Grenen, Dänemarks nördlichstem Punkt, können Sie mit je einem Fuß in zwei Meeren stehen, die sich hier treffen: Kattegat und Skagerrak. Entlang der ganzen Küste können Sie auch traumhafte Sonnenuntergänge genießen.

Sehenswürdigkeiten Bork Vikingehavn 9 km, Skjern Enge 16 km, Zoo Givskud Safari Park 75 km, Kinderland Legoland 55 km.
Sommer

Sandstrand, flach abfallend, für Kinder geeignet, 5 km vom Ort. Surfen, Kanu. Sommersportmöglichkeiten in 10 - 20 km. Golfplatz 18 Loch in Dejbjerg in 20 m. Minigolf. Reiten. Angeln (mit Bewilligung). Wanderwege. Fahrradwege, Vermietung von Fahrrädern und Mountainbikes. Die Westküste ist herb, frisch, berauschend und erquickend. So weit das Auge reicht sieht man lange, breite Sandstrände und Dünen. Dänemarks schönste Sonnenuntergänge können Sie an der Nordsee erleben. Sind Sie für die ruhigeren Gewässer, dann besuchen Sie doch mal die naturgeschützte Halbinsel Skallingen, wo die Seehunde herumtollen, oder das Vogelreservat Tipperne beim Ringköbing Fjord. Dort bietet sich Ihnen ein imponierender Anblick, wenn sich Millionen von Zugvögeln im Frühjahr und Herbst auf ihrem Weg Richtung Norden oder Süden treffen. Dänemarks westlichster Punkt ist der Leuchtturm bei Blåvandshuk. Rund um den Leuchtturm liegen immer noch alte Betonbunker aus dem 2. Weltkrieg

Our location is simply unbeatable! Everything is a short walk away – from groceries to bus stops, shopping, bars and fine dining. We offer you: - Perfect cleanliness - Luxurious Egyptian cotton bed linen - Top Tier Boxspring Bed - Large 55" Smart TV with AppleTV, Netflix etc - Nespresso coffee machine - Fast internet, ideal for work - Spacious shower with quality soaps - Ready-to-Use Kitchen - Completely digital check-in, no paperwork - Unbeatable central location See you! EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNTS: Enjoy attractive discounts starting from 3 nights. Very Attractive Discounts for LONG TERM Stays! THE HOTEL ALTERNATIVE: Offering essential services without the unnecessary extras. IMMACULATE & STYLISH: Our studio boasts high-quality, stylish furnishings, with a focus on cleanliness and comfort. Everything from bed linen to cutlery is carefully selected for beauty, functionality and coziness. LUXURIOUS BEDDING: Sleep soundly and deep in a box-spring bed with premium Egyptian cotton bed linen. CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY: Equipped with an excellent TV, Sonos speakers, fast Wi-Fi and dimmable lights. Streaming services like Netflix and Disney+ are pre-installed for your convenience, along with a wide range of TV channels. EFFORTLESS LUXURY: A thoughtful design that combines functionality, aesthetics and a touch of luxury for an uncomplicated stay. CENTRAL CONVENIENCE: Located near shopping, bars, restaurants and wellness facilities, everything you need is just around the corner. ULTIMATE RELAXATION: After a day out, unwind in your private retreat. Enjoy a warm shower, dry off with plush towels and relax with a glass of wine in a comfortable box-spring bed with Egyptian cotton linens. PERFECT FIT: Ideal for singles and couples who appreciate functional design and class. ESSENTIAL KITCHEN SETUP: Includes a fridge, freezer, toaster and pans, providing all you need for straightforward meal preparation. FONDUE & RACLETTE: Enjoy the Swiss way of eating. We are fully equipped for your Fondue and Raclette Experience. Here is a list of activities you can enjoy around our mountain retreat: Year-Round Activities: Wellness & Relaxation: visit the spas in nearby resorts. Fine Dining: Savor regional and international cuisine in cozy mountain restaurants. Shopping: Explore local boutiques and shops. Culture & Events: Traditional festivals, concerts and cultural events take place year-round. Winter Activities: Skiing & Snowboarding: Top-tier slopes in Lenzerheide one of the worlds best and biggest Ski Resorts Cross-Country Skiing: Perfectly groomed trails through snowy landscapes. Sledding: Family-friendly sledding runs for all ages. Snowshoeing: Experience the tranquility of snow-covered winter landscapes. Winter Hiking: Cleared trails through scenic snow-covered areas. Ice Skating: Rinks and frozen lakes available nearby. Christmas Markets: Visit festive markets with local specialties and crafts. Summer Activities: Hiking: Endless trails with breathtaking views for every skill level. Mountain Biking: Exciting trails and downhill runs for all abilities. It is called Bike Kingdom for a reason! Mountaineering & Climbing: Challenging routes for experienced climbers. Mountain Lakes: Cool off in crystal-clear alpine lakes. Golfing: Scenic golf courses nearby – the 18-hole Lenzerheide Golf Course is just 4 minutes away. You’ll have plenty of options for adventure and relaxation in any season. And if the weather doesn’t cooperate, staying in is wonderfully cozy and relaxing!
- Bed linen, towels and kitchen towels are provided at no extra charge - Garage parking included for studios 4 and 6, studio 2 has no parking space. Public parking spaces available nearby.

attributes.name: facilitiessightseeingnearby
description:
Kleiner, ruhiger Ferienort, 2'000 Einwohner, auf einer Anhöhe, 10 km von Cham, 12 km von Bad Kötzting, 50 km von Deggendorf. Alle Dienstleistungen 2 - 10 km. Wellnesspark Wellenbad mit Wellnessbereich 12 km. Zandt liegt mitten im Naturpark Oberer Bayerischer Wald und ist ein guter Ausgangspunkt für eine Bayerwald-oder Böhmerwaldrundfahrt, weitere Ausflugsmöglichkeiten in die Drei-Flüsse-Stadt Passau oder in die nahe Tschechische Republick (50 km). Blaibacher See (Baden, Bootfahren) 10 km. Kanu und Angeln im nahen Fluss Regen.
Winter

Wintersportfreunde können im gesamten Bayerischen Wald ihrem Vergnügen nachgehen. So kommen Langlaufbegeisterte direkt vor der Haustür in Zandt, oder z. B. im Langlaufzentrum Bretterschachten auf Ihre Kosten. Alpin-Skifahren kann man unter anderem auf den Weltcup-Pisten am Arber oder im Skizentrum Sankt Englmar. Schlittenfahren ist in Zandt, auf den Winterrodelbahnen in Bodenmais oder am Geisskopf möglich.

attributes.name: facilitiessightseeingnearby
description:
410 - 945 m.ü.M. >>Gemütliche, familienfreundliche Stadt, im Süden der Region, 10 km von Freyung, 28 km von Passau, 130 km von Regensburg. Alle Dienstleistungen im Ort. Konzerte, Museum. Hallenbad, Sauna, Kuranwendungen, Massage. attributes.name: facilitiessightseeingnearby
description: Bekannter, familienfreundlicher Luftkurort, 8'900 Einwohner, 29 km von Cham, 33 km von Deggendorf, 45 km von Straubing. Alle Dienstleistungen im Ort. Hallenbad, Sauna, Solarium. Viechtach gehört zu den beliebtesten Ferienorten des Bayerischen Waldes. An einer Talschleife des Schwarzen Regen reizvoll gelegen, zeichnet sich die Stadt durch das mildeste Frühjahrs- und Herbstklima des Waldlandes aus, hervorgerufen durch zwei Hauptkämme des Bayerischen Waldes, die sich im Norden und Süden aufbauen. Viechtach und seine Umgebung werden das "grüne Herz des Bayerischen Waldes" genannt. Nebelfreie Lage und geringe Bewölkungsstunden haben das Institut für angewandte Geodäsie bewogen, nahe bei Viechtach eine Satelliten-Beobachtungsstation einzurichten. Mit dem Logo bestehend aus "Grossem Pfahl" und "Schwarzem Regen" bezeugt Viechtach, daß man bestrebt ist, "Urlaub im Einklang mit der Natur" möglich zu machen, nicht umsonst wird die wildromantische Landschaft um den Fluss Schwarzer Regen auch als „Bayerisch Kanada“ bezeichnet.

description.general:
60 m2. More information by the provider: Apartment in the Hotel Schweizerhof. Quiet, idyllic location, terrace. Hotel infrastructure includes a wellness area: swimming pools and sauna area can be used free of charge. Very centrally located, perfect base for downhill or cross-country skiing.
Renovated, traditionally furnished 2½-room holiday flat in the Hotel Schweizerhof (60 m2) in building section 5. Ground floor flat with terrace seating area (view of the Lenzerhorn). Stone floor throughout with underfloor heating; well-equipped kitchen with dining area; separate bedroom with double bed and two single sofa beds in the living area. Bathroom with bathtub; storage room/redoubt; washing machines and dryers next to the flat. Reserved parking space in the underground garage with direct access to the flat. Passenger lift available.
- Services included: complete re-equipping of the kitchen after each guest change with Taps | washing-up liquid | cloths | sponges | dishwashing brush | rinse aid & salt for dishwasher | kitchen roll | kitchen towels | Kleenex | toilet paper - Bed linen charge includes towelling with large bath towel - Bathrobe per person CHF 20.00 - Garage parking free of charge in summer, CHF 10.00 / day in winter - Dogs CHF 20.00 / day - Free use: ski and snowboard room at Hotel Schweizerhof, free access to the family pool with steam bath and outdoor pool with whirlpool at Hotel Schweizerhof | swimming pool with counter-current system at Hotel Lenzerhorn (directly accessible) - the hammam and sauna can be booked for an extra charge.

description.general: Frindorf: Beautiful, quiet location on the river! Natural bathing possibility directly at the holiday home. Cosy, comfortable single-family house "Reiter", 2 storeys. In the district of Frindorf 6 km from the centre of Rohrbach, in a secluded, quiet, sunny position, 50 m from the edge of the forest, 50 m from the river, in the countryside. Private: property 3'700 m2, garden (not fenced), pond. Hot tub, terrace (20 m2), garden furniture. In the house: infrared sauna. Parking (for 2 cars). Carport. Supermarket 4 km, shopping centre 6 km, restaurant 200 m, bakery 4 km, café 4 km, bus stop 1.3 km, railway station "Bahnhof Haslach" 1.3 km, outdoor swimming pool 6 km. description: Durch seine Bestrebungen hinsichtlich Badewasserqualität hat sich Cavalaire verdient gemacht. Der Ort befindet sich ganz im Süden der Maurenküste und wird von bewaldeten Hügeln umgeben. Gemütlicher, familienfreundlicher Badeort, 7'000 Einwohner, direkt am Meer, 15 km von St Tropez, 18 km von Ste Maxime, 80 km von Cannes. Im Ort: Supermarkt, Einkaufsgeschäfte, Lebensmittelgeschäft, Metzgerei, Bäckerei, Boutique, Post, Bank, Restaurant, Bar, Disco, Night Club, Kasino, Konzerte, Abendunterhaltungen, Kino. Zudem: Apotheke, Arzt. Weitere Möglichkeiten für Einkauf in 10 km. Verbringen Sie hier, zwischen Stränden und Hügeln, zwischen Himmel und Meer, an der Küste des Mittelmeers, zusammen mit Freunden und Familie, einen Ihrer schönsten Sommer.

description.general:
140 m2. More information by the provider: Our mountain retreat offers an unbeatable mix of luxury and convenience for any season! Whether you’re exploring nearby resorts or cozying up inside during bad weather, you'll love it. We offer: - Tranquil location near world-class resorts - Rain shower & Jacuzzi - Hotel Quality Beds - Premium bed linen - AC - Fast internet - 55" Smart TV with streaming services - fully equipped kitchen - Seamless digital check-in - Free EV Charging with Solar Power Here is a list of activities you can enjoy around our mountain retreat: Year-Round Activities: Wellness & Relaxation: Enjoy the jacuzzi or visit the spas in nearby resorts. Fine Dining: Savor regional and international cuisine in cozy mountain restaurants. Shopping: Explore local boutiques and shops. Culture & Events: Traditional festivals, concerts and cultural events take place year-round. Winter Activities: Skiing & Snowboarding: Top-tier slopes in Lenzerheide, Davos and other nearby resorts. Cross-Country Skiing: Perfectly groomed trails through snowy landscapes. Sledding: Family-friendly sledding runs for all ages. Snowshoeing: Experience the tranquility of snow-covered winter landscapes. Winter Hiking: Cleared trails through scenic snow-covered areas. Ice Skating: Rinks and frozen lakes available nearby. Christmas Markets: Visit festive markets with local specialties and crafts. Summer Activities: Hiking: Endless trails with breathtaking views for every skill level. Mountain Biking: Exciting trails and downhill runs for all abilities. Mountaineering & Climbing: Challenging routes for experienced climbers. Mountain Lakes: Cool off in crystal-clear alpine lakes. Scenic golf courses nearby – the 18-hole Alvaneu Golf Course is just 2 minutes away. You’ll have plenty of options for adventure and relaxation in any season. And if the weather doesn’t cooperate, staying in is wonderfully cozy and relaxing!
Escape to our luxurious chalet for an unforgettable stay in the mountains! Our cozy retreat boasts state-of-the-art amenities, including floor heating, comfortable sofas, Wlan, modern bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Indulge in the ultimate relaxation with a luxurious rain shower and a rejuvenating jacuzzi. Marvel at the breathtaking views of the mountains and a waterfall from our large terrace. Our chalet, built from an old stable, is infused with modern technology, featuring dimmable lighting throughout the house and large windows that showcase inspiring views. Entertain yourself with Sonos, Apple TV and Netflix during your stay. Our chalet is the perfect getaway for those seeking both comfort and luxury in a picturesque mountain setting. Need a car? Together with our partner Electric Dreams we rent electric cars for your stay. You can charge them directly at the house with our solar panels. Please be in touch with the landlord if you need a sustainable and comfortable ride.
- Bed linen, towels and kitchen towels are provided at no extra charge - Two parking spots right in front of the house. With heavy snow only one parking available. Nearby parking available.

Our cozy retreat boasts state-of-the-art amenities, including floor heating, comfortable sofas, Wlan, modern bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Indulge in the ultimate relaxation with a luxurious rain shower and a rejuvenating jacuzzi. Marvel at the breathtaking views of the mountains and a waterfall from our large terrace. Our chalet, built from an old stable, is infused with modern technology, featuring dimmable lighting throughout the house and large windows that showcase inspiring views. Entertain yourself with Sonos, Apple TV and Netflix during your stay. Our chalet is the perfect getaway for those seeking both comfort and luxury in a picturesque mountain setting. Need a car? Together with our partner Electric Dreams we rent electric cars for your stay. You can charge them directly at the house with our solar panels. Please be in touch with the landlord if you need a sustainable and comfortable ride.
- Bed linen, towels and kitchen towels are provided at no extra charge - Two parking spots right in front of the house. With heavy snow only one parking available. Nearby parking available.

description.general: Minusio 6 km from Locarno Piazza Grande: Large, comfortable villa "Vernice Gialla", 377 m a.s.l., 3 storeys, detached from the 19th century, renovated in 2020, surrounded by trees and meadows. On the outskirts, 3 km from the centre of Minusio, in a sunny, elevated position on a slope, excellent location: right in the centre but still quiet, 3.5 km from the lake, in the countryside, south-west facing position. Private: natural state property 2'800 m2, terraced garden wildlife garden and trees, swimming pool angular (3 x 6 m, seasonal availability: 15.May. - 20.Oct.) with internal staircase. Shower/WC in the pool area, patio, arbour, terrace, garden furniture, barbecue, pool maintenance by the owner/gardener. In the house: central heating system, washing machine, tumble dryer. Linen change (suppl. charge extra). Towel change (suppl. charge extra). Room cleaning on request (extra). Motor access to the house. Parking (for 3 cars) at the house. E-charging station. Shop 3 km, grocery 3 km, supermarket 3 km, shopping centre 3 km, restaurant 800 m, bus stop "Linie 312" 100 m, railway station "Locarno SBB-CFF" 4 km, thermal baths "Termali Salini SPA Locarno" 5.3 km, bathing lake "Lago Maggiore" 3.5 km, lake Lago Maggiore. Golf course (18 hole) 10 km, tennis 6.5 km, minigolf 4 km, walking paths from the house 10 m. Nearby attractions: Piazza Grande, Locarno, Ascona, Ronco s/Ascona, Brissago, Isole di Brissago, Falconeria Locarno, Adventure Parc, Gordola. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Bosco Gurin, Carì, Airolo, Nara, Campo Blenio. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Lago Maggiore, Lago di Lugano, Lago di Como, Lago D'Orta IT. Hiking paths: Cardada, Monti di Ronco, Val Resa, Valle Verzasca, Vallemaggia, Monte Tamaro & Splash Spa. Please note: no lift. Suitable for families, suitable for seniors baby equipment on request (extra). The owner does not accept any youth groups. Animals in the neighbourhood. Neighbourhood highly sensitive to noise. Quietness and good behaviour expected. ,The Old Lady, as she is affectionately called, was restored in 2020 and since then the villa and the outdoor area have been lovingly optimized during the winter months. The villa has a beautiful garden with a granite-framed pool with a beautiful lake view, many terraces and lush plants. The many sunny spots invite you to linger, the breathtaking view of Lake Maggiore completes this holiday feeling. "Villa Vernice Gialla", 7-room villa 183 m2 on 3 levels. Bright, comfortable and tasteful furnishings: open large living room with panoramic window with open-hearth fireplace and cable TV (flat screen), radio. Exit to the veranda. Open dining room. Exit to the veranda. Large kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Nespresso) extra). Shower/WC. On the lower ground floor: 2 rooms, each room with 1 bed (180 cm, length 200 cm). Bath/shower/WC. 2nd upper floor: 2 rooms, each room with 1 bed (180 cm, length 200 cm). Exit to the terrace. 1 room with 2 beds (90 cm, length 200 cm). Exit to the terrace. Bath/shower, sep. WC, double hand-basin. 2 large terraces 24 m2 partly covered, large terrace 31 m2, large patio, large garden. Terrace furniture, balcony furniture, barbecue (portable), deck chairs (8). Marvellous panoramic view of the lake, the mountains and the countryside. Facilities: iron, children's high chair, baby cot for up to 2 year olds (extra), hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: suitable for families. Non-smoking house. Maximum 2 pets/ dogs allowed. Fire extinguisher. Please note: the area is only partially fenced, small children should not be left unattended due to the terrace and pool as well as the slope to the surrounding river! The property has only been approved/approved for a maximum of 6 people since 2023. The pool is not heated, but is warmed very well by the sun due to the sunny location. NL-00007099

description.general:
275 m2. More information by the provider: The spacious non-smoking holiday home offers a beautiful view over Lake Thun & the mountain range of the Niederhorn. 2 covered balconies & 3 terraces, 2 of which are covered. Lawn, gazebo with lake view, garden grill, garage, 1 covered car parking space, 2 further parking spaces and a charging station for electric cars. 7 rooms on 3 floors. Ground floor: 2 bedrooms with 2 single beds each, double bedroom with shower/toilet/sauna, sep. toilet. 1st floor: Large living room with seating area & tiled stove, open transition to dining room, open kitchen with dining area. 2nd floor: Entrance, double bedroom & bedroom with four single beds, large bathroom. The deep blue Lake Thun beckons a few minutes' walk away for swimming & sunbathing.
The cottage has: Wi-Fi, barbecue, sauna, TV, radio and much more.
Bed, toilet and kitchen linen 30.00 CHF/person, final cleaning 200.00 CHF. Before check-in, you will receive a payment link where you can enter your credit card details to pay the deposit. Alternatively, you have the option of paying a cash deposit of CHF/Euro 600. Dogs cost 45.00 CHF per stay/dog, maximum two dogs are allowed, payment in cash on site. The apartment is to be left broom-clean at the check-out. Please observe the current guidelines of the Federal Office of Public Health regarding the maximum number of persons indoors.

98 m2. More information by the provider: The 2014 newly built Holiday apartment Bristolino is located next to Hotel Bristol. This spacious apartment sleeps 6 people in 3 separate bedrooms. Bristolino has an open plan living area, with a kitchen, dining table and lounge. This apartment has prime position next to the piste, with it’s own south facing terrace and stunning glacial views. Details and equipment of the apartment Master Bedroom 16 m² with a double bed 180 x 200cm, flat screen TV and en suite bathroom. 1 Room 10 m² with a twin bed 180 x 200cm 1 Room 9 m² with a twin bed 160 x 200cm These two rooms share a bathroom with a shower and toilet. 18m², open plan fully equipped kitchen with a large dining table. 20m² lounge with flat screen TV, Wi-Fi and cozy sofas. We also provide a ski room with ski boot heating. Entire size of the apartment is 98 m² Additional Services 10% discount in the "Glacier Sport" on the whole ski equipment rental. Free Wi-Fi / W-LAN. Appartment Bristolin ****+ 2013 we built our newly Appartment Bristolino which is located directly beside Hotel Bristol. The spacious apartment sleeps 6 people in 3 separate bedrooms. In the open plan living area, with kitchen, dining table and lounge, you will feel comfortable like at home. There is also a terrace with stunning glacial views. The apartment is only 1 minute walk from the ski lifts for full mountain access. It`s situated opposite the Ski and Snowboard meeting point and the Ice Hockey and Curling Rink. In summer we are just beside the start of many hiking trails and cable cars. The sports field with football, tennis, volleyball and basketball, as well as the alpine golf course and driving range are just one minute away. In summer all the cable cars are included in the price. (except Metro Alpin) Details and equipment of the apartment 1 room 16m² with a double bed 180 x 200cm, flat screen and a bathroom with bath, shower and toilet. 1 room 10m² with a twin bed 180 x 200cm. 1 room 9m² with a twin bed 180 x 200cm. These two rooms share a bathroom with shower and WC. 18m², open designed and fully equipped kitchen with a large dining table. 20m² lounge with flat screen, Wi-Fi and cozy sofas. A south facing terrace with mountain and glacial views. We also provide a ski room with ski boot heating. Entire size of the apartment is 92m². Floor heating, free Wi-Fi. On request we offer hotel service, as well as breakfast and/or dinner in the Hotel Bristol. Breakfast chf 15.- / dinner with 4 course menu chf 40.- Additional services 10% discount in the "Glacier Sport" on the whole ski equipment rental. Free Wi-Fi / Wi-Fi Good bye gift
Holiday taxes Summer (01.06. -31.10.): CHF 7.- for adults, CHF 3.50 for children (age 6 - 15.99) per day. Holiday taxes Winter (01.11. -31.05.): CHF 4.50 for adults, CHF 2.25 for children (age 6 - 15.99) per day. Final cleaning CHF 120.- . It is possible to book hotel service.

description.general:
170 m2. More information by the provider: The Fifinhaus in Fiesch offers you the ideal combination of a central location and a nature-based holiday experience. Located right next to the valley station of the gondola lift, you can reach the impressive heights of the Aletsch Arena in just a few minutes – a paradise for winter sports with skiing and snowboarding opportunities. Even in summer, the region impresses with a variety of recreational activities and beautiful hiking trails in the immediate vicinity. The lovingly furnished house provides you with everything you need for a relaxing and varied break in the stunning mountain landscape of the Valais.
The Fifinhaus offers a spacious, family-friendly holiday apartment with room for up to ten people. The accommodation features five bedrooms, a modern kitchen-living area, a traditional Stüble and a cozy living room with a Swedish stove – ideal for relaxing hours in the cooler seasons. A children's bed is also available. The kitchen is fully equipped and provides ample space for shared meals in larger groups. Outside, a sunny seating area invites you to linger. During the summer months, a terrace with a large grill is also available – perfect for cozy evenings outdoors. Entertainment is provided by a table football game, which is equally popular with children and adults. Pets are welcome.
Rental price including: bed, bath and kitchen linen, electricity as well as two parking spaces Rental price excluding: final cleaning and tourist tax.

description.general: Very beautiful, cosy chalet "Chalet Manson". 1.5 km from the centre, on a slope. Private: garden (not fenced). Garden furniture, barbecue. In the house: storage room for skis. Steep motor access. In Winter: please take snow chains, 4x4 car recommended in winter. Parking. Shop 1.5 km, supermarket 1.7 km, restaurant 700 m, bus stop "Haute-Nendaz, station/poste" 1.8 km, railway station "Sion" 17.5 km, outdoor swimming pool 1.1 km. Golf course (18 hole) 18.5 km, tennis 1.1 km, gondola lift 2 km, ski bus stop 50 m, ice rink 1.5 km, children's playground 1.2 km. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Tracouet 2 km. Please note: ski bus (free of charge). Parking for 1 large car or 2 small cars. "Chalet Manson", 5-room chalet 164 m2. Comfortable and beautiful furnishings: entrance hall with separate WC. Large living/dining room with open-hearth fireplace and cable TV. Exit to the balcony, north facing position. Large, open kitchen (dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (nespresso) extra, raclette grill, fondue Set (cheese)). On the lower ground floor: 1 room with 1 french bed (148 cm, length 200 cm), shower/WC. 1 room with 2 beds (90 cm, length 190 cm). 1 room with 1 french bed (148 cm, length 200 cm). 1 children's room with 1 x 2 bunk beds (90 cm, length 190 cm). Entrance hall. Bath/shower/WC. Heating, underfloor heating. Large balcony. Balcony furniture, electric barbecue (portable). Very beautiful view of the mountains. Facilities: washing machine, dryer, children's high chair, baby cot, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Parking (2 cars). Please note: parking space for small car only. 1 pet/ dog allowed.

description.general:
180 m2. More information by the provider: Chalet Inge is a beautiful individual 2-floors wooden chalet located in quiet and sunny area of Saas Fee. Chalet Inge offers fantastic panoramic mountain views and private garden areas around the chalet. The local free ski-bus stop is only 400 meters away operates in winter only). Chalet Inge features 4 bright bedrooms of which 2 of them have balconies, a large living/dining area with a newly refurbished modern fully equipped open-kitchen, one bathroom on the lower floor with shower and towel heater and 1 bathroom on the top floor with bath and sauna. Free WiFI is also available
4 1/2 room apartment on 2 floors, chalet of 180m2, 4 double bedrooms, living room with eating corner, separate kitchen with Nespresso Coffeemachine, shower/WC, bath/WC with sauna, south balcony, vue to the mountains.
Holiday taxes Summer (01.06. -31.10.): CHF 7.-/adults, CHF 3.50/children (age 6 - 15.99) per day. Holiday taxes Winter (01.11. -31.05.): CHF 4.50 for adults, CHF 2.25 for children (age 6 - 15.99) per day. Saastalcard included.   Final cleaning, bed linen and towel (except kitchen cleaning) included. Pets are allowed with an additional fee of CHF 5.00 per day.

description.general: Caux 7 km from Montreux: Rustic chalet "Le Revers", detached, surrounded by trees and meadows. In a secluded, quiet, sunny position, in a cul-de-sac. Private: property 3'000 m2, garden 2'300 m2 (not fenced). In the house: fitness room. 4x4 car recommended in winter. Parking (for 2 cars) at the house. Grocery 2 km, supermarket 6 km, restaurant 100 m, bus stop "Montreux" 8.2 km, railway station "Haute-de-Caux" 100 m. Mountain railway 100 m, ski lift 30 m, sled run, cross country ski track 100 m, ice rink 800 m. Motorway close by 10 km from the property. Main road close by 4 km from the property. Railway line closeby 100 m from the property. "Le Revers", 5-room chalet 100 m2 on 2 levels. Partly renovated in 2018, simple and comfortable furnishings: living/dining room with dining table, satellite TV, DVD, tiled stove and paraffin heater. Exit to the garden, to the terrace. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, freezer, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Nespresso) extra). Sep. WC. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: suitable for families. Non-smokers only. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed.

description.general: Crènn 13 km from Malvaglia: Large, child friendly single-family house "Rustico Tecc du Martin", 1'120 m a.s.l., surrounded by fields. 2 km from the centre of Leontica, 24 km from the centre of Biasca, 45 km from the centre of Bellinzona, in the district Valle di Blenio, in a sunny, elevated position, 100 m from the edge of the forest, in a cul-de-sac, in the countryside. Private: natural state property 400 m2, meadow. Garden furniture. 100 m long bumpy motor access to the house (via unmade road, mountain road). Parking on the premises. Shop 5 km, supermarket 9 km, restaurant 4 km, bakery 17 km, bicycle rental 7 km, bus stop "Leontica Chiesa 133" 2.5 km, railway station "Biasca FFS - SBB" 20 km, outdoor swimming pool 45 km. Riding stable 4 km, walking paths from the house 10 m, chair lift 4 km. Nearby attractions: Castello di Seravalle 12.5 km, Museo Valle di Blenio, Lottigna 9 km, Archivio Fotografico Donetta 5 km, Castelli di Bellinzona UNESCO 45 km, Mercato di Bellinzona Sabato 45 km, Splash & Spa, Monte Tamaro 53 km. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Laghi di montagna Retico, Luzzone, Ritom, Lago Maggiore, Locarno 65 km, Lago di Lugano 70 km. Hiking paths: Nara, Lucomagno, Valle di Blenio, Dötra, Centro pro-natura Lucomagno, Val Malvaglia, Valle Leventina. Please note: car recommended. Suitable for families. Animals in the neighbourhood. "Rustico Tecc du Martin", 3-room house 70 m2. Spacious, practical and cosy furnishings: open living/dining room with panoramic window with open-hearth fireplace, dining table and satellite TV. Shower/WC. Upper floor: (spiral staircase) open gallery with sloping ceilings with 2 beds (90 cm, length 200 cm). Garden. Deck chairs (2), sitting area. Panoramic view of the mountains and the valley. Facilities: iron, children's high chair, baby cot for up to 2 year olds (extra), hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). description.general:
70 m2. More information by the provider: Completely new, stylishly and comfortably furnished 2.5-room apartment (70sqm) on the 1st floor of a multi-family chalet built in 2019, equipped with lift. 1 furnished balcony (accessible via living/dining room, facing south/west) and 1 unfurnished balcony (accessible via bedroom, facing north) belong to the apartment. The basement has its own laundry room with washing machine, tumble dryer and storage room. A ski room for shared use and 1 reserved parking space (no. 23) in the underground parking with charging facilities for electric cars are also available. The apartment is located in the heart of Schönried and is suitable for summer and winter holidays. Within walking distance of the apartment you will find everything you need for an uncomplicated holiday: railway station, dairy, butcher's shop, bakery with grocery shop, several restaurants, two sports shops and the chairlift Horneggli.
The apartment Grace combines rustic charm with modern comfort. Living/dining room with spacious open-plan kitchen (equipped among other things with induction hob, oven with warming drawer, refrigerator, freezer, wine cooler, dishwasher, coffee machine with capsules (Nespresso) as well as a fondue- and raclette-set), dining table, sofa and TV (Swisscom). 1 bedroom with 1 double bed (2x100x200cm) and direct access to the bathroom with shower/toilet. Additional 1 separate toilet. The whole apartment disposes of an individually adjustable floor heating in each room (incl. bathroom). WiFi and Sonos music system (wireless music pleasure via WiFi) in the living room and bedroom.
INCLUSIVE: Electricity, heating, water, 1 parking space (no. 23) in the garage, washing machine, tumble dryer, WiFi, kitchen and bathroom towels, bed linen (initial supply), final cleaning and visitor's tax. EXCLUSIVE: Capsules for the Nespresso coffee machine can be obtained from the apartment owner at CHF 00.50 per capsule. ***There is a deposit fee of CHF/EUR 300.00 to pay directly in cash to the keyholder at the arrival*** ***Pets welcome*** Important: Please note that in most of the properties only one pet (usually one dog) is allowed. Further respectively other animals have to be requested before booking.

attributes.name: facilitiessightseeingnearby
description: The Europa Sport Region, 80 km southwest of Salzburg, includes Zell am See, Kaprun, and Piesendorf. Zell am See offers a charming old town, restaurants, and bars by the lake. Kaprun, known for its glacier skiing, is 8 km away. Piesendorf, between Zell am See and Kaprun, offers cycling, hiking, tennis, golf, and more. The area features 240 km of cycling paths, 400 km of hiking trails, and various outdoor activities.

Supermarket 1.5 km, bus stop "Högmoos" 1.2 km, railway station "Taxenbach Rauris" 3.6 km. Ski lift 16 km, gondola lift 13 km, ski bus stop 1.5 km. "Pfisterer", 4-room house 120 m2 on 2 levels. Tasteful and cosy furnishings: 1 room with 1 double bed. Exit to the terrace. 1 room with 1 double bed. Bath/WC. Heating. Upper floor: living/sleeping room with 1 double sofabed, dining table and satellite TV (flat screen). Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 1 double bed and shower. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, freezer, electric coffee machine) with dining nook. Sep. WC. Panoramic view. Facilities: iron, children's high chair, baby cot, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smokers only. 2 pets/ dogs allowed. 50622-091034-2020

description.general: Ches 24 km from Malvaglia: >>Please note: The Rustico is located at 500 mt. from the main road, 15 minutes to walk (mountain paths). 4x4 car recommended!! Ideal holiday home for nature lovers, those seeking real contact with the mountain, great for trecking with wonderful views. Beautiful, cosy, rustic single-family house "Rustico Andrea", 1'460 m a.s.l., renovated in 2019, surrounded by meadows. In the district Valle di Blenio, in a quiet, sunny position on top of a hill, 50 m from the edge of the forest, south facing position. Private: natural state property 600 m2. Garden furniture, barbecue. In the house: storage room for bicycles. 250 m long very bumpy motor access (via unmade road). 250 m footpath to the house. Parking on the premises. Supermarket 13 km, shopping centre 33 km, restaurant 500 m, bus stop "Leontica Chiesa 133" 7 km, railway station "Biasca FFS - SBB" 25 km. Walking paths from the house 5 m. Nearby attractions: Negrentino, Castello di Seravalle, Museo Valle di Blenio, Archivio fotografico Donetta, Castelli di Bellinzona UNESCO, Mercato di Bellinzona Sabato, Splash & Spa, Monte Tamaro. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Laghi di montagna Retico, Luzzone, Lago Ritom, Lago di Lugano, Lago Maggiore. Hiking paths: Nara, Lucomagno, Valle di Blenio, Dötra, Centro pro-natura Lucomagno, Valle Malvaglia, Valle Leventina. Please note: car recommended. Not suitable for children under 6 years. Animals in the neighbourhood. "Rustico Andrea", 2-room house south facing position. Bright, partly with sloping ceilings, tasteful and cosy furnishings: open living/dining room with open-hearth fireplace, TV and electric heating. Exit to the garden. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, freezer, raclette grill, fondue Set (cheese)) with bar. Exit to the terrace. Shower/WC. Wood heating. Upper floor: (steep stair), 1 open room with sloping ceilings with 2 beds (90 cm, length 200 cm), 1 double bed (1 x 200 cm, length 210 cm). Wooden floors. Barbecue (portable), deck chairs (2). Marvellous panoramic view of the mountains and the valley. Facilities: hair dryer. Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smoking house. 2 pets/ dogs allowed. Fire extinguisher. NL-00003893

description.general: Locarno 1 km from Piazza Grande Locarno: Cosy 3-family house "Tazzino", 270 m a.s.l., 3 storeys, detached. On the outskirts, 800 m from the centre of Locarno, in a sunny position on a slope, 1.2 km from the lake. In the house: central heating system, washing machine, tumble dryer (for shared use). Stepped path (35 steps) to the house. Parking space n G at 80 m. Grocery 800 m, restaurant 300 m, bus stop "LINIE 2" 100 m, railway station "Locarno" 2.3 km, outdoor swimming pool 1.5 km, indoor swimming pool 1.5 km, public bathing area 2 km. Sports harbour 1.5 km, golf course (18 hole) 8 km, tennis 1.5 km, minigolf 1.2 km, mountain railway 1 km, children's playground 1.2 km. Nearby attractions: Piazza Grande, Falconeria, Mercato Cannobio IT, Mercsto Intra IT, Mercato Luino IT. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Bosco Gurin, Nara, Campo Blenio, Airolo. Hiking paths: Monte Bré, Locarno, Cardada, Valle Verzasca, Valle Maggia, Centovalli. Please note: no lift. Animals in the neighbourhood. "Tazzino", 4-room apartment 100 m2, on the top floor, south-east facing position. Partly with sloping ceilings, beautiful and cosy furnishings: open large living/dining room with open-hearth fireplace, satellite TV, flat screen, radio and CD-player. 1 double bedroom with 1 double bed (2 x 90 cm, length 200 cm), 1 folding bed (80 cm, length 180 cm). 1 room with 1 french bed (1 x 140 cm, length 200 cm). 1 room with 1 french bed (1 x 160 cm, length 200 cm). Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, microwave, electric coffee machine). Bath/WC, shower/WC. Oil heating, boiler (300 litres). Natural stone floors. Terrace, 20 m2, south-east facing position. Balcony furniture, barbecue. Partial view of the lake, the mountains and the resort. Facilities: children's high chair, baby cot for up to 2 year olds (extra). Internet (WiFi, free). Parking space n G (2 cars) at 80 m. Please note: non-smokers only. Maximum 2 pets/ dogs allowed. 51 stairs from entrance up to top floor. "Krups Dolce Gusto" coffee machine (capsules can be bought at the Coop). NL-00006498

description.general: Brissago 10 km from Ascona: Beautiful, comfortable "rustico" cottage "Garuda", surrounded by trees. In a quiet, sunny, elevated position in the residential district, 500 m from the lake, in a cul-de-sac, in the countryside, south-east facing position. Private: patio, terrace, garden furniture, barbecue. Motor access to the grounds. Stepped path (35 steps) to the house. Public parking 500 m on the road extra. Grocery, restaurant, café 500 m, 15 minute walk to the centre, bus stop "Linie 8" 500 m, railway station "Locarno SBB- CFF" 12 km, outdoor swimming pool 800 m. Golf course (18 hole) 11 km, minigolf 10 km, walking paths from the house 50 m. Nearby attractions: Ascona - Locarno, Dannemann Centro, Brissago, Mercato Cannobio, Luino, Ponte Tresa IT, Outlet Foxtown, Mendrisio, Falconeria, Locarno, Swissminiatur, Melide. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Cardada, Bosco Gurin, Nara, Campra, Campo Blenio, Cari, Airolo, Andermatt. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Lago Maggiore, Lago di Lugano, Lago di Como. Hiking paths: Cardada, Monte Bré, Monte Tamaro-, Monte Lema, Centovalli, Valle Verzasca, Valle Maggia, Valle Onsernone. Please note: Loading and unloading of baggage is possible at the holiday house. 2-room apartment 45 m2 on 2 levels, south facing position. Object suitable for 2 adults. Spacious and bright, partly with sloping ceilings, comfortable and stylish furnishings: open living/dining room with Scandinavian wood stove, TV, flat screen, radio and electric heating. Exit to the terrace, to the patio. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Nespresso-mitbringen) extra). Shower/WC. Upper floor: open gallery with 1 double bed (1 x 160 cm, length 200 cm). Exit to the garden. Patio. Terrace furniture, deck chairs (2), sitting area. Beautiful view of the lake, the mountains and the countryside. Facilities: children's high chair, baby cot for up to 2 year olds, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smoking house. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm, fire extinguisher. NL-00004268

description.general: Beautiful, cosy 3-family house "Chalet Hobelbank". Above Grindelwald, in the district of Oberäll, 2.6 km from the centre, in a quiet, sunny position on a slope, south facing position. In the house: central heating system. In Winter: please take snow chains, 4x4 car recommended in winter. Stepped path to the house. Shopping centre 2.6 km, restaurant 2.6 km, bicycle rental 3 km, 30 minute walk to the centre, bus stop "Dec.-March/June-Oct." 50 m, railway station "Grindelwald Dorf" 2.6 km, outdoor swimming pool 3.5 km, indoor swimming pool 2.7 km. Golf course (9 hole) 4.5 km, tennis 4 km, minigolf 2.9 km, sports centre 2.7 km, gondola lift 3.2 km, ski rental 2.7 km, ski bus stop 50 m, sled run 10 m, cross country ski track 4 km, children's playground 2.7 km. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Thuner-/Brienzersee 18 km. Please note: car recommended, no lift. Suitable for families. Ski bus (free of charge). Free ski bus service to the ski region First and Männlichen/Kl. Scheidegg. The keys‘ handover takes place by the agency Interhome in Grindelwald. Neighbourhood highly sensitive to noise. Quietness and good behaviour expected. 2-room apartment 53 m2, on the ground floor, south facing position. Object suitable for 2 adults + 2 children. Bright, comfortable and cosy furnishings: open living/dining room with dining table, cable TV, flat screen and DVD collection available. Exit to the terrace, south facing position. 1 room with 1 bed (160 cm, length 200 cm), 1 x 2 bunk beds (90 cm, length 190 cm). Small kitchen (3 hot plates, oven, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Nespresso) extra, raclette grill, fondue Set (cheese)). Bath/WC. Terrace 15 m2, south facing position. Terrace furniture. Marvellous view of the mountains, the countryside and Eiger. Facilities: washing machine, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Parking (1 car), garage space n 42D. Please note: suitable for families. Non-smokers only. 1 pet/ dog allowed. Private entrance, fire extinguisher.

description.general: Apartment block "Plein Soleil A", 3 storeys. In the district of Chevalley, in a quiet, sunny position, 1.6 km from the skiing area, in a cul-de-sac, south-west facing position. In the house: storage room for skis, central heating system, washing machine, tumble dryer (for shared use, extra), drying room. Motor access to 30 m from the house (ramp). In Winter: please take snow chains. Parking (limited number of spaces) at the house. Supermarket 1.2 km, restaurant 280 m, bakery 1.5 km, café 280 m, bicycle rental 1.4 km, bus stop "Postal Ovronnaz, Plein Soleil" 67 m, railway station "Riddes" 11.3 km, thermal baths 2.1 km. Comfortable and beautiful furnishings: living/dining room with dining nook, cable TV, hi-fi system, DVD and wood-burning stove. Exit to the balcony. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, microwave, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (Delizio) extra, raclette grill, fondue Set (chinoise, cheese)). Bath/WC. Upper floor: 1 room with 1 french bed (160 cm, length 200 cm). Exit to the balcony. 1 room with 2 beds (90 cm, length 200 cm). 1 small children's room with sloping ceilings with 2 pull-out beds (2 pers. 2 x 90 cm, length 200 cm). Gallery. Shower/WC. Facilities: iron, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Parking space n 10 (1 car) at 30 m. Please note: non-smokers only. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed.

description.general: Child friendly resort "Holiday Vital Resort". 165 houses in the resort. 500 m from the centre of Großenbrode, 13 km from the centre of Burg auf Fehmarn, 79 km from the centre of Lübeck, 800 m from the sea. For shared use: property 14 ha with meadow. Basketball, volleyball, children's playground. In the complex: reception, restaurant, bistro, shopping facilities. Parking at the house. E-charging station. Supermarket, bakery 100 m, bus stop 500 m, railway station "Großenbrode" 500 m, sandy beach 800 m, indoor swimming pool 26 km. Golf course (18 hole) 13 km. Please note: suitable for families. Groups of teenagers on request only. The photograph shows a typical example. Note: Services such as bed linen and towels can be ordered in advance and must be paid directly to the key holder by credit card or bank transfer up to 14 days before arrival. "Holiday Vital Resort (GBE122)", 4-room house 79 m2. Bright, modern and wooden furniture furnishings: living/sleeping room with 1 double bed, Scandinavian wood stove, dining table, satellite TV, CD-player and DVD. Exit to the terrace. 1 room with 2 beds. 2 rooms, each room with 1 double bed. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine). 2 showers/WC, hydro massage bath, Sauna. Electric heating. Terrace. Terrace furniture, barbecue (portable). Facilities: washing machine, dryer, children's high chair, baby cot. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smoking house. Maximum 2 pets/ dogs allowed. Smoke alarm. Wi-Fi is only available for 6 devices per house at the same time.

Golf course (36 hole) 7 km, gondola lift, skisport facilities, ski rental 10 m. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Schmittenhöhe 10 m, Kitzsteinhorn 11 km, Saalbach Hinterglemm 20 km. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Zeller See 2 km. The holiday properties may differ in living space, floorplan, equipment and furnishing. Check-in is in the apartment house Emma Deluxe (Fürth 153, 5721 Piesendorf). Late arrivals only possible by prior arrangement. Use of the sauna is charged at 30€ per hour/per apartment.

description.general: Historical working farm "Jockelsbauernhof und Backhäusle", 440 m a.s.l.. In the district of Ehlenbogen 3.5 km from the centre of Alpirsbach, 10 km from the centre of Schiltach, 19 km from the centre of Freudenstadt, in a secluded, sunny position. For shared use: property with meadow, orchard. Children's playground (swing, sandbox), parking on the premises. Shop 3.5 km, bus stop "Unterehlenbogen" 400 m, railway station "Alpirsbach" 3.5 km, outdoor swimming pool 4 km, indoor swimming pool 4 km. Golf course (9 hole) 8.5 km. Please note: the owner lives on the same property. The BACKHÄUSLE (DE7297.608.1) on the same property, as the name suggests, the former bakery, has been completely restored. The old building structure, quarry sandstone on the ground floor and half-timbered extension in the attic, as well as the old wood-fired oven have been preserved and give the house its unique charm. Hikes are possible from the house, the Kinzigtal cycle path runs past the house. The children's adventure trail 'Felix and his hat' ends at the farm. 3 inns (approx. 350-1500 m) are also within walking distance. "Backhäusle", 2-room house 45 m2 on 2 levels. Simple and rustic furnishings: kitchen-/living room (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, electric coffee machine) with dining table and satellite TV. Exit to the terrace. Shower/WC. Oil heating. Top floor: (steep stair), 1 open room with sloping ceilings with 2 beds and 1 double bed. Electric heating. Parquet floors. Terrace. Terrace furniture, barbecue, deck chairs. Facilities: baby cot. Please note: non-smoking house. 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm. Note: From the kitchen-living room steep wooden stairs/ladder through open floor hatch into the attic.
description.inside: "Backhäusle", 2-room house 45 m2 on 2 levels. description.general: Beautiful, rustic house "Zoé". In the centre Créances, 5 km from the centre of Lessay, 13 km from the centre of La Haye-du-Puits, 3 km from the sea, 3 km from the beach. Private: property 450 m2 (fenced) with lawn, parking on the premises. Shop 20 m, supermarket 250 m, restaurant 20 m, bus stop "LESSAY_Abbatiale" 3.7 km, sandy beach 3 km. Golf course (18 hole) 19 km. "Zoé", 2-room house 60 m2 on 2 levels. Bright, beautiful and cosy furnishings: living/dining room with open-hearth fireplace (only for decoration), dining table and TV. Exit to the garden. Small, open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 2 gas rings, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine). Shower, sep. WC, double hand-basin. Top floor: (steep stair) open gallery with sloping ceilings with rooflight with 2 beds. 1 room with sloping ceilings with rooflight with 1 french bed. Electric heating. Parquet floors, natural stone floors. Garden. Barbecue, deck chairs (3), box-room. Facilities: washing machine, iron, children's high chair, baby cot. Internet (WiFi, free). Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Instead of an enclosed bedroom, some sleeping areas are located in an open-plan area (gallery, alcove, etc.).

description.general: Terraced house. 600 m from the centre of Le Vieil, 3 km from the centre of Noirmoutier-en-L'Ile, in the residential district, 250 m from the sea, 250 m from the beach. For shared use: property (fenced) with lawn and flowers, beautiful garden to relax. Barbecue, children's playground (swing). Private: garden 100 m2 (fenced) with lawn. Arbour, terrace, garden furniture. In the house: storage room for bicycles. Parking on the premises. Supermarket 600 m, bus stop "Centre de Noirmoutier" 3 km, sandy beach "de la Madeleine" 250 m. Sports harbour 4 km, sailing school 200 m. "Coquelicot", 2-room terraced house 28 m2. Object suitable for 2 adults + 2 children. Beautiful furnishings: living/dining room with 1 double sofabed (125 cm, length 190 cm), dining nook, kitchen corner and TV (flat screen). Exit to the garden, to the terrace. 1 room with 2 bunk beds (80 cm, length 190 cm), 1 french bed (140 cm, length 190 cm). Kitchenette (4 hot plates, oven, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine). Shower/WC. Electric heating. Terrace, south facing position, porch. Terrace furniture. Facilities: washing machine, dryer, iron. Internet (WiFi, free). Parking at the house. Please note: 1 pet/ dog allowed. Private entrance, smoke alarm. Bed layout is flexible. There are more sleeping options available than the maximum number of people allowed which may, however, not be exceeded. Offer by a private individual according to  Art. 155, IV of CGI.

description.general: Le Besset 3 km from Vielprat: House "l'Assemblée", 1'000 m a.s.l., detached, surrounded by meadows and fields. In the hamlet Le Besset 3 km from the centre of Vielprat, 6 km from the centre of Arlempdes, 35 km from the centre of Le Puy. Private: large terraced garden, 1'300 m2 (not fenced) with natural garden, meadow, parking on the premises. Shop 8 km, supermarket 25 km, bus stop 20 km. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Lac de Naussac 30 km. "L'Assemblée", 3-room house 65 m2 on 2 levels. Renovated in 2019, tasteful and cosy furnishings: living/dining room with dining table, satellite TV and wood-burning stove. Exit to the garden. Kitchenette (oven, dishwasher, 4 gas rings, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Sep. WC. Upper floor: 1 room with 1 french bed (160 cm). 1 room with 1 french bed (140 cm). Shower. Electric heating. Patio. Terrace furniture, barbecue (portable), deck chairs (3). View of the countryside and the forest. Facilities: washing machine, iron, children's high chair. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smokers only. Maximum 2 pets/ dogs allowed. Smoke alarm. FR4349

description.general: St. Martin am Grimmig 5 km from Öblarn: Small cottage "Grüne Oase", 700 m a.s.l., detached. In the district of Diemlern 5 km from the centre of Öblarn, 2.5 km from the centre of St. Martin, 29 km from the centre of Schladming, in a quiet, elevated position on a slope, in the woods. Private: large garden 2'000 m2 (fenced) with meadow. Children's playground (swing). In the house: storage room for skis. 300 m long bumpy motor access to the grounds (via unmade road). Stepped path to the house. Parking (for 4 cars) on the premises. Shop 1.5 km, supermarket 3.5 km, restaurant 250 m, bar, bus stop 250 m, railway station "Niederöblarn" 3.8 km, outdoor swimming pool 2 km, thermal baths "Grimming Therme" 22 km, bathing lake "Putterersee" 12 km. Mountain railway 21 km, ski lift 21 km, ski bus stop 300 m, cross country ski track 5.5 km. Nearby attractions: Schloss Trautenfels 6.5 km. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Hauser Kaibling 21 km. "Landhaus Grüne Oase", 3-room house 70 m2 on 2 levels. Modern and stylish furnishings: living/dining room with Scandinavian wood stove, dining table, dining nook, satellite TV and radio. 1 room with 1 sofabed and 1 x 2 bunk beds. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Shower/WC. Upper floor: 1 room with sloping ceilings with 1 double bed. Wood heating. Terrace, patio. Terrace furniture, barbecue (portable), deck chairs (4), box-room. Very beautiful panoramic view of the mountains and the countryside. Facilities: children's high chair, baby cot. Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smoking house. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm.
description.inside: "Landhaus Grüne Oase", 3-room house 70 m2 on 2 levels. description.general: Very beautiful, cosy, comfortable timber house 800 m a.s.l., surrounded by trees and meadows. 2 houses in the residence. In the district of Kranzbach 3 km from the centre of Gröbming, 14 km from the centre of Haus im Ennstal, 22 km from the centre of Schladming, in a sunny position on a slope, 11 km from the lake, 13 km from the skiing area, in the countryside. For shared use: natural state property 30 ha with meadow, courtyard, swimming pool round fenced (10 x 5 m, depth 100 - 280 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Jan. - 31.Dec.). Terrace, garden furniture. In the house: storage room for skis, ski boot dryer. In Winter: please take snow chains. Communal covered parking at the house. Supermarket 3 km, restaurant 3 km, bus stop 200 m, railway station "Stein an der Enns" 5 km, outdoor swimming pool 3 km, bathing lake "Aich" 11 km. Mountain railway 16 km, ski lift 13 km. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Hauser Kaibling 14 km. Please note: the owner lives on the same property. Property ref. AT8962.636.1/2 is situated on the same property. The complex has another 1 chalet for rent. "Fredis Hütte", 5-room house 120 m2 on 2 levels. Partly with sloping ceilings, cosy and wooden furniture furnishings: living room with open-hearth fireplace, dining table, dining nook, satellite TV, radio and CD-player. 1 room with 1 double bed and shower. Open kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Sep. WC. Top floor: 2 rooms, each room with 1 double bed. 1 room with 1 double sofabed, 1 double bed and shower/WC. Shower/WC, double hand-basin, Sauna. Heating, underfloor heating. Wooden floors. Terrace partly roofed. Terrace furniture, barbecue, deck chairs. Beautiful panoramic view of the mountains, the valley and Grimming. Facilities: sauna, baby cot. Internet (WiFi, free). Parking (5 cars) at the house. Please note: non-smoking house. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm. Available in the kitchen: beer dispenser (beer kegs against payment from the owner) as well as a constantly filled modern coffee machine with various hot drinks at the push of a button is available for a fee (billed on site at the end of your stay).

title: Ferienwohnung Les Coteaux de la Nartelle

description.general: Residence "Les Coteaux de la Nartelle". Outside the resort, 5 km from the centre of Ste Maxime, in a sunny, elevated position on a slope, 400 m from the sea, 400 m from the beach. For shared use: park 10 ha with plants and trees, swimming pool (6 m diameter, depth 140 - 240 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Jun. - 30.Sep.). Table tennis, boccia. Stepped path to the house. Parking (limited number of spaces). Shop 5 km, supermarket 2.5 km, shopping centre 5 km, restaurant 400 m, bus stop 700 m, railway station "Saint-Raphael TGV" 20 km, sandy beach "Plage des Elephants" 400 m (small), thermal baths "Thalassothérapie Les Issambres" 7 km. Sports harbour 4 km, golf course (18 hole) 5 km, tennis 3 km. Nearby attractions: Aqualand waterpark 6 km, Azur Park attractions 16 km, Saint-Tropez/Ramatuelle 18 km, Port-Grimaud 13 km, Gorges du Verdon 95 km, Navette / shuttle boat St-Tropez 15min 4 km. Hiking paths: Massif des Maures 5 km, Massif de l'Esterel 25 km. Please note: car recommended, no lift. Residence with electric gates. The keys‘ handover takes place by the agency Interhome in Sainte-Maxime, 5 km. Additional accommodations can be booked. 1-room apartment 21 m2, on the ground floor. Simple furnishings: entrance hall with 1 x 2 bunk beds (80 cm, length 190 cm). Living/dining room with 1 double sofabed (140 cm, length 190 cm), TV. Exit to the terrace. Kitchenette (2 hot plates, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Bath/WC. Electric heating. Terrace 8 m2, roofed. Terrace furniture. Distant view of the sea. Facilities: washing machine. Internet (WiFi, extra). Parking space n 313. Please note: non-smokers only. 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm. Instead of an enclosed bedroom, some sleeping areas are located in an open-plan area (gallery, alcove, etc.). 83115003104HT

description.general: Residence "Les Coteaux de la Nartelle". Outside the resort, 5 km from the centre of Ste Maxime, in a sunny, elevated position on a slope, 400 m from the sea, 400 m from the beach. For shared use: park 10 ha with plants and trees, swimming pool (6 m diameter, depth 140 - 240 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Jun. - 30.Sep.). Table tennis, boccia. Stepped path to the house. Parking (limited number of spaces). Shop 5 km, supermarket 2.5 km, shopping centre 5 km, restaurant 400 m, bus stop 700 m, railway station "Saint-Raphael TGV" 20 km, sandy beach "Plage des Elephants" 400 m (small), thermal baths "Thalassothérapie Les Issambres" 7 km. Sports harbour 4 km, golf course (18 hole) 5 km, tennis 3 km. Nearby attractions: Aqualand waterpark 6 km, Azur Park attractions 16 km, Saint-Tropez/Ramatuelle 18 km, Port-Grimaud 13 km, Gorges du Verdon 95 km, Navette / shuttle boat St-Tropez 15min 4 km. Hiking paths: Massif des Maures 5 km, Massif de l'Esterel 25 km. Please note: car recommended, no lift. Residence with electric gates. The keys‘ handover takes place by the agency Interhome in Sainte-Maxime, 5 km. Additional accommodations can be booked. 2-room apartment 25 m2. Comfortable furnishings: dining room with 1 double sofabed (140 cm, length 190 cm), TV and air conditioning. Exit to the terrace. 1 small room with 1 french bed (140 cm, length 190 cm). Kitchenette (2 hot plates, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Shower/WC. Electric heating. Terrace 11 m2, south facing position. Balcony furniture. Very beautiful view of the sea. Facilities: washing machine. Internet (WiFi, extra). Parking. Please note: non-smokers only. 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm. The property is accessible by 39 steps. This property has access to the round swimming pool. Offer by a private individual according to  Art. 155, IV of CGI. 83115003012AK

For shared use: natural state property 30 ha with meadow, courtyard, swimming pool round fenced (10 x 5 m, depth 100 - 280 cm, seasonal availability: 01.Jan. - 31.Dec.). Terrace, garden furniture. Open kitchen (oven, 4 ceramic glass hob hotplates, toaster, kettle, microwave, electric coffee machine). Shower/WC, sep. WC. Wood heating. Parquet floors, carpet. Balcony. Very beautiful view of the mountains. Facilities: Internet (WiFi, free). Please note: non-smoking house. Maximum 2 pets/ dogs allowed. Smoke alarm, fire extinguisher.

description.outside: Large, rustic farmhouse "Salzmannhof", 1'020 m a.s.l., 3 storeys. In the district of Leiten 3 km from the centre of Ramsau, 4 km from the centre of Schladming, in the residential district, 9.5 km from the lake, 5 km from the skiing area. In the house: storage room for skis, ski boot dryer. Roofed, parking on the premises. Shop 2 km, restaurant 1 km, bus stop "Ramsau Leiten Sonnenhügel" 1 km, railway station "Schladming" 4.5 km, outdoor swimming pool 4 km, indoor swimming pool 4 km, bathing lake "Pichl" 9.5 km. Ski lift 5 km, ski bus stop 300 m, cross country ski track 50 m. Well-known ski regions can easily be reached: Planai 6 km. Please note: the owner lives in the same residence.

description.general: Eze 13 km from Nice: Beautiful residence "Les Balcons d'Eze", 4 storeys. 650 m from the centre of Eze Village, in a sunny, elevated position residential area (villas), south facing position. For shared use: swimming pool angular (13 x 6 m, depth 80 - 190 cm, seasonal availability: 01.May. and 31.Oct. pool opening hours: 09:00-22:00). Shower/WC in the pool area. In the complex: lift. Grocery, supermarket 600 m, restaurant 450 m, bus stop "Les flots bleus" 180 m, pebble beach "Plage d'Eze" 3 km. Nearby attractions: Parfumerie Fragonnard (visite labo) 500 m, Monaco 8 km, Nice 13 km, Vintimille 30 km, Cannes 37 m, Aqualand à Fréjus 68 km. Well-known lakes can easily be reached: Saint Cassien 62 m. Hiking paths: Parc National du Mercantour 67 m, Col de Vence 52 m. Only the wearing of swimsuits is authorized in the swimming pool of the residence. 2-room apartment 48 m2 on 2nd floor, south facing position. Bright, partly renovated in 2023, comfortable and beautiful furnishings: living/dining room with panoramic window with 1 double sofabed (1 x 140 cm, length 190 cm), TV (flat screen), air conditioning and electric shutters. Exit to the terrace. 1 room with 1 double bed (2 x 90 cm, length 200 cm). Open kitchen (mini-oven, oven, dishwasher, 3 induction hot plates, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine, Capsules for coffee machine (nespresso) extra) with dining table. Bath/shower/WC. Electric heating. Terrace 12 m2, south facing position. Terrace furniture. Marvellous view of the sea, the mountains, the swimming pool and the garden. Facilities: washing machine, iron, hair dryer. Internet (WiFi, free). Garage (1 car), height 200 cm, width 220 cm. Please note: non-smokers only, parking space for small car only. 1 pet/ dog allowed. Smoke alarm. Offer by a private individual according to  Art. 155, IV of CGI. 24938

description.general: Child friendly resort "Le Mediterranée". 150 apartments in the residence. 3.3 km from the centre of Argelès-sur-Mer, 8 km from the centre of Saint Cyprien, 24 km from the centre of Perpignan, 2 km from the sea. For shared use: property 55'000 m2, plants and trees, swimming pool (480 m2, depth 150 - 180 cm, seasonal availability: 25.Apr. - 14.Sep.). Children's pool, slide, table tennis, boccia, children's playground. In the complex: reception, restaurant, bar, bistro, shopping facilities, washing machine, tumble dryer (for shared use, extra). Bread roll service. Parking. Shop 3.3 km, bus stop "Mairie/Hotel de ville-Argelès" 3 km, sandy beach 2 km. Please note: car-free holiday complex. Entertainment. Childminding in the season. The owner does not accept any groups. Loading and unloading of baggage is possible at the holiday house. The photograph shows a typical example. The holiday properties may differ in living space, floorplan, equipment and furnishing. "Le Mediterranée", 3-room mobile home 28 m2. Practical furnishings: living/dining room with dining table, satellite TV and international TV channels. Exit to the terrace. 1 room with 1 french bed (140 cm, length 190 cm). 1 room with 2 beds (80 cm). Open kitchen (4 gas rings, toaster, kettle, microwave, freezer, electric coffee machine). Shower/WC. Electric heating, air-conditioning. Terrace. Terrace furniture, deck chairs (2). Facilities: children's high chair, baby cot for up to 2 year olds (extra). Internet (WiFi, extra). 1 pet/ dog allowed.

description.general:
175 m2. More information by the provider: 5 room chalet (175sqm) with large surrounding. Quiet and sunny situation. Stunning panorama view looking over Schönried and to the beautiful mountains. Terrace and balcony with garden furniture. Near the ski slopes and cross-country ski runs. Storage room for sports equipment as well as laundry room are available in the basement. 3 opened parking spaces in front of the house. In winter 4x4 or snow chains are required, alternatively you can leave the car at the beginning of the 300 meter long access road.
Ground floor: Entrance area. Laundry with washing machine for the common use as well as a store room for skis and sports equipment. 1st floor: Living room with sitting area, large dining table and TV (satellite and DVD player). Access to the balcony from the living room. Next to the living room is the separate kitchen (among other things with dishwasher, oven, microwave, refrigerator with deep-freezer compartment, filter coffee / coffee machine with capsules (Nespresso) as well as a fondue-raclette set. 1 bedroom with 2 pushed together single beds (2x90x190cm). 1 separate toilet. 2nd floor: 1 bedroom with 2 pushed together single beds (2x90x190cm) and access to the balcony. 1 bedroom with 2 single beds (2x90x190cm). Those two bedrooms are connected. 1 bedroom with 1 single bed (90x190cm) and 1 baby cot. 1 bathroom with bathtub and toilet. All bedrooms dispose of a washbasin. WiFi. Baby cot (60x110cm, excl. bed linen) and highchair available.
INCLUSIVE: electricity, heating, water, 3 opened parking spaces, washing machine, WiFi, baby cot (60x110cm) excl. bed linen, highchair, kitchen and bathroom towels, bed linen (initial supply), final cleaning and visitor's tax. description.inside:
175 m2. More information by the provider: 5 room chalet (175sqm) with large surrounding. Quiet and sunny situation. Stunning panorama view looking over Schönried and to the beautiful mountains. Terrace and balcony with garden furniture. Near the ski slopes and cross-country ski runs. Storage room for sports equipment as well as laundry room are available in the basement. 3 opened parking spaces in front of the house. In winter 4x4 or snow chains are required, alternatively you can leave the car at the beginning of the 300 meter long access road.
Ground floor: Entrance area. Next to the living room is the separate kitchen (among other things with dishwasher, oven, microwave, refrigerator with deep-freezer compartment, filter coffee / coffee machine with capsules (Nespresso) as well as a fondue-raclette set. 1 bedroom with 2 pushed together single beds (2x90x190cm). 1 separate toilet. 2nd floor: 1 bedroom with 2 pushed together single beds (2x90x190cm) and access to the balcony. 1 bedroom with 2 single beds (2x90x190cm). Those two bedrooms are connected. 1 bedroom with 1 single bed (90x190cm) and 1 baby cot. 1 bathroom with bathtub and toilet. All bedrooms dispose of a washbasin. WiFi. Baby cot (60x110cm, excl. bed linen) and highchair available.

Private: property 1'000 m2, well-kept garden, lawn for sunbathing, biotope. Outdoor shower, terrace, garden furniture, barbecue. In the complex: sauna (extra).
